import React, { Component } from 'react'; class ToolBar extends Component { state = { unread: 0 } getUnreadMessages = () => { let number = this.props.messages.filter(message => !message.read) console.log(number) this.setState({ unread: number }) } render() { return (

{this.state.unread} unread messages

) } } export default ToolBar;
